name: Varesa
title: "Strength in Serenity" Varesa
desc: Steadfast in defense, unshakeable in offense.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Varesa to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: By the Horns
skills.desc: Deals ? ?. When the Skill used this time is Plunging Attack: Deal +1 DMG. This character enters Nightsoul's Blessing, and gains 1 Nightsoul point.

skills.name: Riding the Night-Rainbow
skills.desc: Deals ? ?, applies Sudden Onrush to self, enters Nightsoul's Blessing, gains 1 Nightsoul point, then switches to the next character.

skills.name: Guardian Vent!
skills.desc: Deals ? ?, applies Apex Drive to self.

skills.name: Tag-Team Triple Jump!
skills.desc: (Passive) After Varesa uses a Skill: If she has 2 Nightsoul points, she consumes 2 Nightsoul points and applies Apex Drive to herself.
